definition: not just in name only, but also in reality (idiom)
(of one's words) to be in accord with reality (idiom)

sentences.english: So saying sodium bicarbonate julep is in fact not true.
sentences.chinese: 所以说小苏打去黑头的说法其实不现实。

sentences.english: Yeah, well, I'm actually in basic training at the minute.
sentences.chinese: 其实我现在就在接受基本的训练。

sentences.english: It is not cogitation; it is a waste of life.
sentences.chinese: 其实没必要想那么多，那只是在浪费生命。

sentences.english: The amount of pesticides present as residues on food is miniscule.
sentences.chinese: 食品上的农药残余量总量其实是很少的。

sentences.english: Have you found the model of SWFC at your own home?
sentences.chinese: 其实，环球的造型我们每个人家里都有。

sentences.english: Actually, the hot feeling of love will cool down after 100 days.
sentences.chinese: 其实，爱情的致热期会在100天后开始冷却。

sentences.english: What Chastain was wearing was, in fact, a prototype for the Nike Inner Actives range of sports underwear.
sentences.chinese: 其实，查斯顿穿的是耐克运动内衣系列的样品。

sentences.english: The question is sort of, what is sublimation?
sentences.chinese: 这个问题其实在问什么是升华？

sentences.english: But they were uttered only within his imagination.
sentences.chinese: 其实只是在他的想象之中发出了声。

sentences.english: In fact, this tour is the classic red and white hand-shooting game machine small bees.
sentences.chinese: 其实这款手游就是经典红白机射击游戏小蜜蜂。

sentences.english: He hated the way I called him out.
sentences.chinese: 他其实很讨厌我那样冲他嚷。

sentences.english: There are general patterns for reading comprehension passages.
sentences.chinese: 对于这一点，阅读理解部分其实是有迹可循的。

sentences.english: They nix the idea upon learning that DHMO is actually water.
sentences.chinese: 在知道一氧化二氢其实是水以后他们放弃了这种想法。
问之其实已有十年之心律不整病史。

sentences.english: Love and it is not mysterious, WWw. 55dou. com it can always fascinated people.
sentences.chinese: 爱情它其实并不神秘，可总是让人对它很着迷。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, the enterprise-oriented social partnership is held back by various factors.
sentences.chinese: 其实，以企业为主导的社会伙伴关系面对种种的限制。

definition: in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
